title: Software Engineer2
description:
**About The Role**
 Imagine a world where your Uber arrives, completely driverless, ready to take you safely to your destination. That's the future we're building in the
 **Autonomous Mobility \\& Delivery (AM\\&D)** 
 team. This isn't just a side project; it's one of Uber's most significant investments, designed to bring autonomous vehicles to our Rides and Eats services across all 10,000\\+ cities globally. We're truly just getting started on this transformative journey.
   

  

 As we navigate this exciting path, we face unique engineering puzzles:
   

  

* How do we ensure every Uber customer \\- from riders to eaters to merchants \\- enjoys a safe, clear, and truly magical experience, all without a human driver?
* What makes people embrace AVs? How do we build trust and excitement around these new, driverless experiences?
* How do we guarantee a rider's autonomous trip is always safe, informative, and reliable, from the moment of pickup to drop\\-off, even without a person behind the wheel?

title: Sr Software Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
 Imagine a world where your Uber arrives, completely driverless, ready to take you safely to your destination. That's the future we're building in the
 **Autonomous Mobility \\& Delivery (AM\\&D)** 
 team. This isn't just a side project; it's one of Uber's most significant investments, designed to bring autonomous vehicles to our Rides and Eats services across all 10,000\\+ cities globally. We're truly just getting started on this transformative journey.
   

  

 As we navigate this exciting path, we face unique engineering puzzles:
   

  

* How do we ensure every Uber customer \\- from riders to eaters to merchants \\- enjoys a safe, clear, and truly magical experience, all without a human driver?
* What makes people embrace AVs? How do we build trust and excitement around these new, driverless experiences?
* How do we guarantee a rider's autonomous trip is always safe, informative, and reliable, from the moment of pickup to drop\\-off, even without a person behind the wheel?


**What The Candidate Will Need / Bonus Points**
 \\-\\-\\-\\- What the Candidate Will Do \\-\\-\\-\\-
   

  

 As a
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
 , you won't just be writing code; you'll be leading key initiatives that directly impact our team's biggest goals. You'll collaborate closely with product and design experts to turn initial ideas into robust technical designs and then launch them into the world.
   

  

**Here's What You'll Be Doing**
* Crafting a strategic roadmap that cements Uber's leadership as the go\\-to platform for autonomous ridesharing.
* Overseeing the full lifecycle of multiple projects across different business areas, leveraging your deep understanding of user experience, marketplace dynamics, and platform versatility to hit key metrics.
* Delivering new products and revolutionary paradigms that consistently boost our KPIs, all while keeping our platform rock\\-solid.
* Developing cutting\\-edge tech that not only prepares Uber for future autonomous vehicle innovations but also makes a wider impact across the entire company.


**Basic Qualifications**
* 6\\+ years of backend engineering expertise.
* Skilled in a core programming language (e.g., C, C\\+\\+, Java, Python, or Go).
* A strong foundation in product development.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* 5\\+ years of overall software development experience.
* Proven track record with rapid, metrics\\-driven product iterations, always prioritizing reliability.
* Extensive experience designing and building large\\-scale distributed systems and scalable backend services using a microservices approach to support fast\\-moving products.
* Comfortable and experienced working in rapidly evolving, pioneering fields.
* A background in the transportation or autonomous vehicle industry would be a plus.
* Experience creating flexible, modular solutions that serve a variety of clients and use cases.
* Deep experience applying Operations Research and Machine Learning to product engineering.
* A knack for navigating complex cross\\-functional environments, collaborating effectively with business, legal, operations, and technical project management teams to achieve consensus.
* Experience working closely with external engineering partners and their cross\\-functional teams.


 Any experience with
 **enterprise mobile engineering** 
 .

title: Software Developer
description:
Software Developer Position
   

  

 We are excited to announce an opening for a Software Developer at our dynamic and forward\\-thinking company located in Noida. This role is ideal for someone with 2\\-5 years of experience, particularly in the areas of Fast API, LLM, and Voice LLM technologies. As a Software Developer, you will be part of a full\\-time, in\\-office team dedicated to developing innovative solutions and enhancing our technology offerings.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain robust software applications using Fast API.
* Implement and optimize LLM (Large Language Models) including voice\\-driven models for enhanced user interactions.
* Collaborate with project managers and other developers to define system requirements, choose frameworks, and design efficient software solutions.
* Write clean, scalable code using relevant programming languages.
* Test and deploy applications and systems, revising, updating, refactoring and debugging code as necessary.
* Maintain cutting\\-edge knowledge of current and emerging technologies, industry trends and standards.


**Required Skills**
* Proficiency in Fast API for backend development.
* Experience with implementing Large Language Models (LLM), especially voice\\-driven interfaces.
* Solid understanding of software development best practices and methodologies.
* Familiarity with version control tools such as Git.
* Ability to write efficient, secure, well\\-documented code with scalability in mind.


**Experience Range**
 2\\-5 years
   

  

**Job Timing**
 This is an in\\-office position requiring the candidate to work from our Noida office during regular business hours.
   

  

**Job Type**
 This is a full\\-time position aimed at candidates ready to commit to a long\\-term project within a stable work environment.
   

  

 If you are passionate about software development with expertise in Fast API and Large Language Models (LLM), including voice interfaces, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your resume detailing your experience in line with the skills required for this role. Join us to advance your career while shaping the future of technology!
   

  

 fast api,llm,voice llm

title: Data Scientist
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Welcome to an exciting opportunity at Ericsson, where you'll be stepping into the role of a Data Scientist. As part of our team, you'll have the opportunity to develop unique machine learning solutions that address complex business issues. If you‚Äôve ever thought ‚ÄúGenAI can do way more in Telecom than chatbots‚Äù ‚Äî this role is for you. We‚Äôre building production\\-grade GenAI systems, AI agents, and enterprise copilots for Telecom OSS/BSS platforms‚Äîautomation, intelligence, and decisioning at scale. No demos. No fluff. Real systems, real impact.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 MCP\\-based applications and tools integrated with enterprise systems
   

  

 Building GenAI Agents
   

  

 RAG pipelines over network, service, customer \\& operational data
   

  

 Scalable Python services \\& APIs powering GenAI workloads
   

  

 Optimized SLMs for cost\\-efficient, low\\-latency deployment
   

  

 Training of SLM/LLM based on domain requirements.
   

  

**The skills you bring:**
 Statistics, Machine Learning Fundamentals, Deep learning expertise.
   

  

 Feature Engineering \\& Model Selection.
   

  

 Strong Python with hands\\-on ML / NLP and GenAI Agent development E2E experience (production grade not experimentation.
   

  

 Experience in Training of LLM/SLM models and changing the network Architecture.
   

  

 Track record of delivering business value in real production grade GenAI Agent.
   

  

 Solid experience with LLMs, embeddings, retrieval systems and agent orchestration frameworks.
   

  

 Proven expertise building GenAI copilots, persona\\-based agents.
   

  

 Hands\\-on experience developing applications using MCP.
   

  

 Experience with production grade cloud\\-native ML deployments.
   

  

 Hands on experience in either of AWS Bedrock or GCP Vertex AI.
   

  

**Good to have:**
 Strong academic background.
   

  

 Experience in having journals \\& patents(US/India).
   

  

 Telecom OSS/BSS domain ( business and data ) knowledge.
   

  

 Experience in reasoning , knowledge graph.
   

  

 Awareness of AI risk, observability, explainability \\& responsible AI.
   

  

 Bonus: experience with Databricks, Snowflake, DataRobot, or similar AI platforms.

**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will work across all layers of web development‚Äîfrom creating engaging user interfaces to building robust, scalable backend systems. This role is ideal for candidates seeking end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design and develop full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow between front\\-end and back\\-end systems

description:
**Web Developer Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is a technology and innovation organization offering hands\\-on training and project\\-based internships in software development, web technologies, AI, data, and cybersecurity. The company focuses on bridging the gap between academic learning and industry requirements through live projects and expert mentorship.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Web Developer Intern, you will work on designing, developing, and maintaining dynamic websites and web applications. This internship is ideal for students or graduates who are passionate about coding, UI design, and building responsive web solutions from concept to deployment.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js, Bootstrap, or Tailwind CSS
* Work with backend technologies such as Node.js, Django, or PHP for full\\-stack development
* Collaborate with designers to create clean, user\\-friendly web interfaces
* Integrate APIs and manage efficient client‚Äìserver communication
* Optimize websites for performance, speed, and SEO best practices
* Debug and resolve technical issues to ensure a smooth user experience



**Requirements** 



* Currently pursuing or completed a Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, IT, or related fields
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript with basic knowledge of frontend frameworks
* Familiarity with backend technologies such as Node.js, Python (Flask/Django), or PHP
* Understanding of databases like MySQL or MongoDB and Git version control
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and creativity in design implementation



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world web projects with live deployment
* Mentorship from experienced developers and designers
* Opportunity to build a strong, professional web development portfolio
* Networking and placement assistance post\\-internship
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

 Training of SLM/LLM based on domain requirements.

 Statistics, Machine Learning Fundamentals, Deep learning expertise.

title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern (Unpaid)** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is dedicated to nurturing future\\-ready developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development skills aligned with real\\-world industry requirements.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will work across all layers of web development‚Äîfrom creating engaging user interfaces to building robust, scalable backend systems. This role is ideal for candidates seeking end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design and develop full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize application performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment



**Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
* Understanding of databases such as MongoDB and MySQL
* Familiarity with REST APIs and Git/GitHub
* Strong logical thinking, problem\\-solving, and teamwork skills



**What You Will Gain** 



* Certificate of Internship
* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time role based on performance

title: DEVELOPER L4
description:
Job description:
   

  

 Job Description
 
**Role Purpose** 




 The purpose of this role is to design, test and maintain software programs for operating systems or applications which needs to be deployed at a client end and ensure its meet 100% quality assurance parameters
 


 Õè
 
**Do** 




 1\\. Instrumental in understanding the requirements and design of the product/ software
 


* Develop software solutions by studying information needs, studying systems flow, data usage and work processes
* Investigating problem areas followed by the software development life cycle
* Facilitate root cause analysis of the system issues and problem statement
* Identify ideas to improve system performance and impact availability
* Analyze client requirements and convert requirements to feasible design
* Collaborate with functional teams or systems analysts who carry out the detailed investigation into software requirements
* Conferring with project managers to obtain information on software capabilities


 Õè
 
 2\\. Perform coding and ensure optimal software/ module development
 


* Determine operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, software development and proposed software
* Develop and automate processes for software validation by setting up and designing test cases/scenarios/usage cases, and executing these cases
* Modifying software to fix errors, adapt it to new hardware, improve its performance, or upgrade interfaces.
* Analyzing information to recommend and plan the installation of new systems or modifications of an existing system
* Ensuring that code is error free or has no bugs and test failure
* Preparing reports on programming project specifications, activities and status
* Ensure all the codes are raised as per the norm defined for project / program / account with clear description and replication patterns
* Compile timely, comprehensive and accurate documentation and reports as requested
* Coordinating with the team on daily project status and progress and documenting it
* Providing feedback on usability and serviceability, trace the result to quality risk and report it to concerned stakeholders


 Õè
 
 3\\. Status Reporting and Customer Focus on an ongoing basis with respect to project and its execution
 


* Capturing all the requirements and clarifications from the client for better quality work
* Taking feedback on the regular basis to ensure smooth and on time delivery
* Participating in continuing education and training to remain current on best practices, learn new programming languages, and better assist other team members.
* Consulting with engineering staff to evaluate software\\-hardware interfaces and develop specifications and performance requirements
* Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code
* Documenting very necessary details and reports in a formal way for proper understanding of software from client proposal to implementation
* Ensure good quality of interaction with customer w.r.t. e\\-mail content, fault report tracking, voice calls, business etiquette etc
* Timely Response to customer requests and no instances of complaints either internally or externally


 Õè
 
**Deliver** 



**No.** 
**Performance Parameter** 
**Measure** 
 1\\.Continuous Integration, Deployment \\& Monitoring of Software100% error free on boarding \\& implementation, throughput %, Adherence to the schedule/ release plan2\\.Quality \\& CSATOn\\-Time Delivery, Manage software, Troubleshoot queries,¬†Customer experience, completion of assigned certifications for skill upgradation3\\.MIS \\& Reporting100% on time MIS \\& report generation
 
 ¬†
 







 ¬†
 



 Experience: 5\\-8 Years
   

 .
 



 ¬†
 



 Reinvent your world. We are building a modern Wipro. We are an end\\-to\\-end digital transformation partner with the boldest ambitions. To realize them, we need people inspired by reinvention. Of yourself, your career, and your skills. We want to see the constant evolution of our business and our industry. It has always been in our DNA \\- as the world around us changes, so do we. Join a business powered by purpose and a place that empowers you to design your own reinvention.

title: Software Development Test Engineer - Packet core
description:
**Join our Team**
**About the Opportunity:**
 At Ericsson, we are shaping the future of connectivity by driving innovations in 5G technology. Our team works at the cutting edge of software development, creating solutions that redefine the telecommunications landscape. Join us to be part of a diverse, global team committed to transforming the way the world connects.
   

  

 As a Software Development Engineer in Test, you will be a working on testing automation critical deliverables for the packet core domain in Ericsson BEWS. You'll collaborate closely with stakeholders across geographies, design and develop complex features.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 Develop test framework and test complex software features for the Private 5G packet core domain and management plane.
   

  

 Engage in requirements discussions with stakeholders and translate them into test plan.
   

  

 Peer review test cases/plan, build automation tests, and ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
   

  

 Debug and isolate production issues, providing quick resolutions.
   

  

 Break down complex tasks into manageable components.
   

  

**What you will bring:**
 Proficiency with scripting language such as Python
   

  

 Cloud Technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, Container, Microservices).
   

  

 Private Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure).
   

  

 Ansible, Shell Scripting, Terraform
   

  

 Tools for CI/CD (Git, Gerrit, Jenkins, Sonar, Helm).
   

  

**Preferred Skills:**
 Experience in LTE/5G Core
   

  

 Experience in Security domain, IPSec
   

  

 Experience with VPP data plane is a plus
   

  

 Knowledge of programming languages like C\\+\\+, Java or GoLang
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you¬¥ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what¬¥s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world‚Äôs toughest problems. You¬¥ll be challenged, but you won‚Äôt be alone. You¬¥ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 India (IN) \\|\\|
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 776767

title: Data Scientist
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 Welcome to an exciting opportunity at Ericsson, where you'll be stepping into the role of a Data Scientist. As part of our team, you'll have the opportunity to develop unique machine learning solutions that address complex business issues. If you‚Äôve ever thought ‚ÄúGenAI can do way more in Telecom than chatbots‚Äù ‚Äî this role is for you. We‚Äôre building production\\-grade GenAI systems, AI agents, and enterprise copilots for Telecom OSS/BSS platforms‚Äîautomation, intelligence, and decisioning at scale. No demos. No fluff. Real systems, real impact.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 MCP\\-based applications and tools integrated with enterprise systems
   

  

 Building GenAI Agents
   

  

 RAG pipelines over network, service, customer \\& operational data
